Reboot to Write Protect Off Mode
Safestrap is a Bootstrap / Recovery for locked bootloader phones. is to avoid touching your primary system.
Special Thanks To Hashcode for his hard work making Safestrap recovery, DeesTroy and TeamWin for all their hard work making TWRP
